solution: 设 $a_1=\sin \alpha, b_1=\cos \alpha, a_2=\sin \beta, b_2=\cos \beta$, 则 $\sin \alpha \sin \beta+ \cos \alpha \cos \beta=0$, 即 $\cos (\alpha-\beta)=0$. 不妨设 $\alpha-\beta=\frac{\pi}{2}$, 从而 $a_1^2+a_2^2=\sin ^2 \alpha+ \sin ^2 \beta=\sin ^2 \alpha+\sin ^2\left(\frac{\pi}{2}+\alpha\right)=1$, 同理 $b_1^2+b_2^2=1, a_1 b_1+a_2 b_2=\sin \alpha \cos \alpha+ \sin \beta \cos \beta=0$.
